§ 300313. Native Hawaiian In this division, the term “Native Hawaiian” means any individual who is a descendant of the aboriginal people who, prior to 1778, occupied and exercised sovereignty in the area that now constitutes Hawaii. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3190.)
